channel.title: Wamp
channel.description: Just wondering how to set a password for wamp/phpmyadmin so other people can't access it.. Also, I have uploaded my database but when you connect to my ip you get sent to the normal wamp screen not the database folder.. Anyone know how to fix this so it goes straight to the database for my server
